docTitle.titlePart: EPR Study of the Nematic Liquid Crystals: PEBAB and EBRA *

byline.docAuthor: A. S. N. Rao, P. Narayana Murty, C. R. K. Murty, and T. Rs. Reddy **

titlePage.byline: Department of Physics, Nagarjuna University, Nagarjunanagar 522510 (India)

front.div:
By EPR two nematic liquid crystals PEBAB and EBBA were investigated. The experimental
variation of the order parameter with temperature is corroborated with theory. In EBBA a
spectrum reminiscent of glassy nature is observed at — 60° C.
